channel.title: Compliance on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Compliance on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Compliance automation via Auditree
item.description: Over the past few years Cloudant has been engaging in more and more compliance related work. This is a good thing; it gives customers confidence in the systems holding their data, and it gives us a way to critically evaluate & improve our product & processes. A compliance accreditation is made up of controls. In some cases lots of controls, all of which need to be consistently & continually executed, with evidence of successful (or otherwise) execution collected for audit.
